video_prompt: Rain streaks across modern high-rises. Lanterns sway, reflecting on rippling water as a traditional boat gently bobs. Wet boardwalks shimmer under changing light. Signs with glowing characters subtly shift.
image_prompt: A cinematic vertical photo of a rainy night in an ancient Asian city. Traditional architecture with glowing Chinese signs and red lanterns coexists with modern high-rises. A wooden boat with a thatched roof and red lanterns is moored on a wet boardwalk by a canal, reflecting warm lights and the dark, rainy sky. Moody blues and grays are punctuated by vibrant oranges, reds, and yellows. Tranquil yet bustling atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Rain streaks across modern high-rises. Lanterns sway, their reflections dancing on rippling water while a traditional boat gently bobs. Changing light plays across wet boardwalks, causing shimmers. Signs with glowing characters subtly shift.
